resources.string: This is the debug screen. However this text will dissapear when data arrives from the server.

--- BUG FIXES
*Force close fixes
*IAC as data fixed
*Improved telnet negotiation with optional debug mode
*Disconnect crash fixes

--- NEW FEATURES
*Portrait Mode
*Word Wrap
*Optional Break Width
*Button Sets are now renamable

Visit the website for more details!
http://bt.happygoatstudios.com
